koohiiStory1: A sheep crossing guard waves a SLOW flag for his fellow sheep crossing the road.
koohiiStory2: Road sign (flag): "Sheep on highway! Drive slowly.".
kunYomi: おく.れる、おく.らす、おそ.い
readingExamples: 遅らす (おく.らす), 遅れる (おく.れる), 遅い (おそ.い)
words:
遅らす(おくらす): to retard, to delay
遅れ(おくれ): delay, lag
遅くとも(おそくとも): at the latest
手遅れ(ておくれ): too late, belated treatment
遅刻(ちこく): lateness, late coming
遅れる(おくれる): to be late
遅い(おそい): late, slow
